alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Putnam; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Whiteside, Bureau, eastern Henry and Putnam Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walnut to Kewanee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Walnut around 735 PM CDT. Buda around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include La Moille, Wyanet, Tiskilwa, Hennepin, DePue, Granville and Bureau Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 27 and 72. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Illinois.
